description: This table contains the target version and instructions information associated with the treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STUDY_TARGET_VERSION
columns.description: The target study version when the study amendment banner is appearing above treatment plan.

columns.name: STUDY_TARGET_INSTRUCTIONS
columns.description: The target study version information when the study amendment banner is appearing above the treatment plan.
